left.question: Estimate yearly profit of CFund?
left.answer: Estimate profit of CFund products may differ. Please contact our Customer Service for further information.

left.question: Where can I see the historical profit of CFUND?
left.answer: Please contact our Customer Service regarding the profit history of CFUND.

left.question: How long is the KYC process will take?
left.answer: KYC will be processed within 1x24 hours if all data is complete.

left.question: How long is the deposit approval process at CFUND?
left.answer: Deposit will be approved every Monday.

left.question: How long is the withdrawal (WD) process?
left.answer: Withdrawal (WD) will be processed on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday on the first week of every month; Withdraw (WD) will be transferred on Thursday - Friday in accordance with the Banks working hour.

left.question: What and how to change Cfund products for customers?
left.answer: Customer could perform the action via app by witdraw all capitals (after lock period was over) and re-deposit the funds to another products.

left.question: Is it possible to register as a new customer without an invitation code?
left.answer: Apologies, as of now CFUND is still on closed loop period and only customers with invitation code are able to register.

right.question: What are the requirements for withdrawal (WD)?
right.answer: Withdraw (WD) will be processed within withdraw period; Withdraw (WD) outside lock period could only be processed on withdrawal week (Monday - Wednesday first week of the month) and penalty will be charged.

right.question: Estimate weekly and monthly profit?
right.answer: Estimate profit percentage for every products on every quarter are below: (CFund Moon (semi-flexible product): Estimate profit per year is 10% > Capital lock: 1 month > Profit WD-able every month); (CFund Stars (mid range): Estimate profit per year is 20% > Capital lock: 3 month / 1 quarter > Profit WD-able every month); (CFund Galaxy (corporate / AI - accredited investor): Estimate profit per year is 30% > Capital lock: 3 month > Profit WD-able every month > Required → contact to CRM only → set a call with Arya & Kurnia (KYC level 2)); CFund Supernova is only for Foreigner customers (Singapore & Malaysia) – Estimate profit per year to be confirmed

right.question: The maximum drawdown at CFund?
right.answer: One of the strategies used in CFund is to determine the stop loss maximum at 20%.

right.question: Can the deposit be transferred from any Banks?
right.answer: Deposit can be transferred from any banks with Virtual Bank Account Number & manual transfer as stated on CFUND Apps.

right.question: Is Top up Investment can be transferred from any Banks as well?
Maximum withdrawal every month?
right.answer: Withdraw CFund Moon: remaining capital must be minimum Rp. 5.000.000 as stated on portfolio; Withdraw CFund Stars: remaining capital must be minimum Rp. 50.000.000 as stated on portfolio; Withdraw CFund Galaxy: remaining capital must be minimum Rp. 500.000.000 as stated on portfolio.

right.question: Can new customers register without an invitation code (if CFUND is already open to the public)?
